name: Sync-Sheep
description:
This game was part of a school assignment about puzzle games.

The 2 Players have the same level set-up, but can only apply their changes to the team-mate by interacting with the buttons. It is your job to figure out how to use these changes to get yourselves to the next stage.

How to play (this game requires atleast one Controller) ActionKeyboardControllerMoveWASDLeft JoystickJumpSpace APickup CubesEXChange Camera ViewArrow KeysRight Joystick
